item.title: DOJ asks Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell 'about 100 different people,' lawyer says
item.description: President Donald Trump is dealing with a weekslong backlash over the DOJ's decision not to release documents related to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: FEMA to send states $608 million to build migrant detention centers
item.description: FEMA is starting a "detention support grant program" to cover the cost of building temporary facilities. States have until August 8 to apply for the f...

item.title: New bill in Congress would reward companies that give stock to rank-and-file employees
item.description: The new bill in Congress would give a tax discount to companies that distribute stock to their lowest paid employees.

item.title: What Europe's response to a no-deal with Trump could look like
item.description: Uncertainty remains about if and when a trade agreement between the EU and U.S. could be struck.

item.title: Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell will meet with DOJ official for second day
item.description: The Trump administration has tried to quell pressure to release files about Jeffrey Epstein, the dead sex offender who once was a friend to the presid...
